ns0:entry.ns0:title: Dolibarr/dolibarr
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Dolibarr/dolibarr
Language: php
Dolibarr ERP CRM is a modern software package to manage your company or foundation's activity (contacts, suppliers, invoices, orders, stocks, agenda, accounting, ...). it's an open source Web application (written in PHP) designed for businesses of any sizes, foundations and freelancers.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: WordPress/WordPress
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/WordPress/WordPress
Language: php
WordPress, Git-ified. This repository is just a mirror of the WordPress subversion repository. Please do not send pull requests. Submit pull requests to https://github.com/WordPress/wordpress-develop and patches to https://core.trac.wordpress.org/ instead.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: WordPress/wordpress-develop
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/WordPress/wordpress-develop
Language: php
WordPress Develop, Git-ified. Synced from git://develop.git.wordpress.org/, including branches and tags! This repository is just a mirror of the WordPress subversion repository. Please include a link to a pre-existing ticket on https://core.trac.wordpress.org/ with every pull request.

ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/openmediavault/openmediavault
Language: php
openmediavault is the next generation network attached storage (NAS) solution based on Debian Linux. Thanks to the modular design of the framework it can be enhanced via plugins. openmediavault is primarily designed to be used in home environments or small home offices.

URL: https://github.com/pterodactyl/panel
Language: php
Pterodactyl¬Æ is a free, open-source game server management panel built with PHP, React, and Go. Designed with security in mind, Pterodactyl runs all game servers in isolated Docker containers while exposing a beautiful and intuitive UI to end users.
